patterns_discovered: Conditional rendering of button based on onResetFilters prop
Using Framer Motion for interactive button animations (whileHover, whileTap)
gotchas_discovered: Button only renders if onResetFilters prop is provided
Requires parent component to implement handleResetFilters logic

approach_outcome.description: Added Reset Filters button to empty state UI with interactive animations

recommendations: Ensure parent component provides onResetFilters handler
Consider accessibility attributes for reset button
Add unit tests for conditional rendering of reset button
